website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses its competitors on features, versatility, and sound quality – clearly the best available on the market today.
pros: Integrates the best online music services with old-school CD and radio capabilities
Unbeatable music options with perfect sound
cons: The instructions that come with it are a bit confusing
It's expensive, but you're paying for top quality

customer_reviews.title: Machine quit playing in middle of new CD
customer_reviews.text: After owning for 10 months and giving it very little use the machine quit in the middle of playing the 3rd track of a new CD. Ejected it and tried again. After "Reading Disk" to went to "Not Playable" Tried other CDs and got the same result. Since I'm well within the one year manufacturer's warranty period I'm hoping they will stand by their product. I am raising the rating from a previous "one", to "four" since I just called Bose support and received prompt attention. They are sending me a UPS label for the return and will fix or repair the unit and extend the warranty for another year. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Douse (aka R. T.  Douse)

customer_reviews.title: Bought for the CD player
customer_reviews.text: So we have about 100 CD's that we don't want to part with and dead set against stepping into the technology of the future, us old people still need a CD player. This little system is amazing for it's size, sounds great. Very happy to have found a quality system that still plays the CD's. Thank you Bose!
customer_reviews.author: smartgardener

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound! I have three complaints. 1. You can only use the remote control to use the radio/CD player. 2. It does not accept wireless headphones 3. You cannot play music from the thumb drive These are all very basic features that should be part of such a high end expensive radio/CD player
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So far loving it, I would have given it a 5 but I don't like that you can't adjust the bass and treble to suit your ear. I have bought and returned 4 systems for that reason. I don't get why you can't do that without spending mega bucks. I know how I like my music to sound, I don't like preset sounds. I'm pleased the Bose doesn't do that, but still I like to adjust it myself. Set up was a piece of cake, it looks nice and sounds better than others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money if you want this for an internet radio!
customer_reviews.text: They updated recently to an outside program that does NOT include any internet radio stations as before. Previously, if you enjoyed a local station abroad and they had an internet broadcast, you'd be able to listen to it on your Bose internet radio. They've "upgraded" to some generic stations that are limited, you can no longer search artists to find specialized stations. Yippee, they added Amazon radio! But if you lost all the stations you've grown to love (Nordic Lodge, 100,1 in Germany and a Spanish Tears for Fears station, for example) forget it. I want to look into returning my radio. Why spend $700 when you can't listen to what you want?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Letter of Reference 05-10-18 08:39:14
customer_reviews.text: I bought Bose Wave SoundTouch Music System IV March 2018. Since then, there were occasionally issues such as CD stopped playing at of sudden. That was for certain CD and the issue was gone the next day. Yesterday, when I put a CD in, it showed CD not playable. I put some other CDs, they were all not working. Can anyone tell me how to return this production? I don't think it worth buying. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a Bose Wave radio and CD player in the early 2000s and it's still working beautifully, so I thought I would get this newer model to add internet radio capability and bluetooth. But my attempts to use that feature have been quite frustrating. The speaker drops the internet connection repeatedly, there are numerous and lengthy software updates, and my previous favorite internet radio stations have been dropped from the service. I paid way too much money for what is basically just a radio and CD player.
customer_reviews.author: shoebabe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio/CD player ... the whole works!
customer_reviews.text: FABULOUS! I actually purchased this on my brother's behalf as a gift for our sister ... and she LOVES IT. It's nice to be able to lay in bed and listen to music or the radio with such clear sound, and then turn it off with a credit-card sized "remote" ... and not even have to get out of bed to do so. She's positioned the radio on a dresser-top across the room to get the best sound. Then she simply "clicks" it off when she is ready to fall asleep. This has high quality sound and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bentley's Folks

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing. I love that I was pretty easily able to set it up with my SMART TV so I can use it and get great sound quality. It is also particularly great for watching stuff on Amazon Prime since Amazon Prime's stuff is way too quiet even on full volume. I really love that it also turns itself off when I turn off the TV. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I’m very pleased with the sound quality but the CD player is crappy!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing. I’m hoping to get Bluetooth speakers to play the music around my house. That was the good news, I really think that the unit I got was refurbished! I started using it. It had been in the box and I got out my CDs, I couldn’t wait to get that Bose sound. I have had brand new CDs inserted and it has trouble reading them and then there’s skipping where you have to keep ejecting and inserting to get them to play. It’s so aggravating! 😡 Oh, whatever you do, don’t lose your remote, the touch on top is unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: HappyHiker

customer_reviews.title: Small Size, Big Sound
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a Bose wave radio for years and finally decided to purchase when it was on sale. Great deal and I'm glad I finally did it! It was pretty easy to set up for a non-techie. I even managed to link my Spotify without having to ask my son for help. I like that it functions as a regular alarm clock and radio but also plays CDs and streams. My only criticism is that the remote is so small I have to grab my readers whenever I want to change a setting.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: As good as the reputation they've earned
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and functional bit of ingenious technology. Music is even throughout the room and maintains it's sound level from room to room. Don't know how they do that! I like being able to search for internet radio stations around the world and across our continent, to get local coverage of breaking news as well as interesting variety of music from other cultures. I put off purchasing a Bose Wave for a long time, due to the cost. Faced with the space requirements of a conventional system, I bit the bullet and I'm very glad that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Sounded OK I figured. Only two settings for base ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounded OK I figured. Only two settings for base. While listening to FM, the one that arrived for me randomly decided to change to the lowest FM setting and I had to scroll back up. After about day 3 we couldn't even get the thing to connect Bluetooth and none of our computers or phones could connect USB, WiFi, or direct Ethernet to the switch. Reset did not resolve the problem and I was unable to update the firmware due to this. Tech support didn't have an answer. Returned it for refund. I'll look at something else.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: WOW! BOSE Hit a Home Run!
customer_reviews.text: The sound on the BOSE SoundTouch is phenomenal. I also reviewed the Peachtree DeepBlue3, and there is no comparison between the two products. The BOSE throws a full soundstage and deep, resonating bass. Whatever trickery BOSE uses to overcome the limitations of the physics, who cares (probably some amount of DSP enhancement)! Their products are not intended to compete with a setup costing tens of thousands of dollars. Having the CD option is great. Streaming is great, until the WIFI goes down or the bluetooth won't connect. Then things get VERY quiet.
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoman

customer_reviews.title: Really? Cd stuck first time I use it?
customer_reviews.text: This piece of equipment arrived in the mail last week. Big descision, it's lot of money. Set up was easier then anticipated eventhough the blue tooth connection,if you use more then one device, is cumbersome but doable. Sound is great especially at higher volume. The first time we tried to eject a CD the disc got stuck!!! $600 piece of equipment!! We tried the suggestions in the manual to no avail After being on hold for 30 minutes with customer service they instructed us to unplug the device, place it upside down and hit it firmly several times on the bottom. I am serious. It worked. I am just floored and I am still contemplating returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works but that is rare
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with some additional Bose speakers so that I could have a system through my house. And when it has worked, it is great. But it rarely works. The app can never find this speaker. Sometimes if I unplug the system and then plug it back in it will work. But not usually. It has been such a colossal waste of money, time, and energy. And trying to get help has been equally as frustrating. I will NEVER invest in Bose again. Never. Life is too short.
customer_reviews.author: eebees

customer_reviews.title: Unresolved Technical Problems
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with great excitement and anticipation and was thrilled when it arrived. Unfortunately, when playing my Apple Music playlists, the volume of the unit swung in wildly unpredictable ways. I would set the volume for the first song at 60. The next song came in at 80 and blew me out of the room. The song after that might come in at 30 and I couldn't hear it. I called BOSE technical support and they were unable to successfully resolve this issue. I returned it to Amazon with great reluctance. (Thank you, Amazon, as always for your great returns policy.)
customer_reviews.author: JW Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good performer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance, but rather pricey. Might be a good idea for Bose to include 2 (two) remotes in case one gets misplaced or damaged. SoundTouch system and other Wave systems requires a remote to even operate. Consumer will not be disappointed by the performance of this product, however. Bluetooth function seems to work well. Nice appearance and great sound. Does not include an auxiliary (optional) FM antenna. Not that it's required, but would be nice of Bose to include this inexpensive option to insure peak reception potential of this FM receiver..
customer_reviews.author: ray j

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I can use my Spotify account. This brand have a always good quality. The best thing what I love in this speaker is the fact that I can control it from my app phone. My sister is Always late to work so I can wake her up in early morning with loud music even if I'm thousand miles from her ( you need to have Internet on the phone ) . I love waking her up hahahahah
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lemon Product.  Lemon customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and buy Sonos. This purchase was my biggest mistake. I repeatedly have speaker connection problems, and barely use it. In this first year, it has already been sent back for one repair, and is now in need of being returned to customer service for another. Further, I would say that the sound is variable. Some days it's clear and strong, others weak. Interestingly, when I call customer service, I'm always given a lecture about using the self help faqs on the web. I cannot understand how, between the inferior product and the frustrating customer service, that Bose has earned it's reputation. Spare yourself. As for me, never again Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas L. Grimaldi

customer_reviews.title: disc driver/reader failed after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: great sound, used infrequently for 12 mos, then the cds started skipping, then the reader would not read discs at all. It still receives bluetooth signals, but will not play cds. for $600+, this is unacceptable. It also is apparently very common, from reading online forums. The only customer support is a pre pay for repair option, then pay for shipping. Otherwise you get to dissasemble the unit and try to clean the laser heads with isoproponal and cotton swabs. Thanks Bose. I will avoid you like the zombie apocolypse from now on and spread the word of your substandard quality and support.
customer_reviews.author: k.v. davis

customer_reviews.title: The system itself has fantastic sound but I had to return it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: The system itself has fantastic sound but I had to return it for a replacement because here was a strange white residue on the screen as if someone had used a cleaner on it. I wiped it off but then it would reappear. Very odd.This item, however, was supposedly new so it should be pristine. I returned it and have a replacement on the way. I would have given 5 stars except the app that goes with the system in order to use Bluetooth/soundtouch features is overly fussy and a little confusing but it's ok once you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not get another one it sucks.
customer_reviews.text: First one I received did not work at all. The replacement plays but quite often skips. You would think for this kind of money it would at least play regularly for a while. Next time I'm just going to get a cheap one from Target. Bose used to be the gold standard but has really gone downhill. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this, it fills my place with clear, wonderful sound. Its small, it takes up so little room. Set up was a breeze, took 2 minutes and by the way, I am an idiot at all things technical so for me to say this was easy, it was EASY! Just plug it in and go. Clear directions and great little remote.
customer_reviews.author: Linda in NC

customer_reviews.title: Love the size of this!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this system, as we wanted something that was small but still sounded good. This works great, but we did notice a major difference in sound depending upon the placement in the room. At first the sound quality was just okay, when it was placed on a table, but when we moved it to a corner location where it faced outward in the room the sound quality was much better..so if you are able to place in a corner it makes it sound much better. The Soundtouch app is really a great feature too, we like being able to play all our amazon prime music playlists on this system!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Too much bass
customer_reviews.text: OK. For $500.00, you should be able to reduce the bass and increase the treble. This system has to be the worst system out there. If you like heavy bass and very low tone, then this system is for you. When I listen to music, I like my bass and treble to be set at zero. I want to hear the real sound of the instruments. Sorry all you Bose lovers. I'm just old school.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't set it up.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it needs an app is annoying. The fact that the app didn't work is infuriating. I never really understand what a one star rating means; a singular bad experience or operator err. But there were clues, the facts that set up service was so readily available tells me there are a lot of problems. It appears Bose cannot produce a plug-and-play system. This is not my 1st Internet radio with CD player. In fact, it's not my 1st Bose with those options. My 1st Bose worked for a decade. Dan 3/12 I bought a Revo and it's up and running.
customer_reviews.author: dan w carmichael

customer_reviews.title: I only wish I had gotten a version with multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: I only wish I had gotten a version with multiple CD capacity. The sound fills the room and hides the source so well you really feel as if you are in the middle of it sll.
customer_reviews.author: Feldmar Twomblebee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE BOSE
customer_reviews.text: I HAD THIS SAME SYSTEM YEARS AGO THE QUALITY IS STILL THERE I PURCHASED OTHER RADIO SYSTEMS MY OPINION PRETTY USELESS I COULD NOT EVEN GET BUT ONE RADIO STATION PURCHASED ANTENNA FOR THE OTHERS AND STILL COULD NOT GET THE STATION TO CLEAR TURN ON MY BOSE GRAB THE RADIO STATION I WANT RITE AWAY NO ANTENNA EXCEPT THE INTERNAL ONE PURCHASE THE ONE THE PLUGS IN TO THE BACKSIDE AND THE STATION COMES IN EVEN CLEARER AN THE SOUND IS THE SAME QUALITY OF THE ONE I HAD YEARS AGO I WILL ALWAYS STAY WITH BOSE ALWAYS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I have considered buying this system for quite a while and I'm glad I finally decided to go for it. I hesitated partly because of the price and partly because I have previously had another similar system (different maker) that was disappointing. The Bose certainly fills the room and more with clear rich sound. The ability to play and control from another device (for me, my computer) is great. It's also attractive and looks good on a table in my living room. I'm still learning to use the system but I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: GRB

customer_reviews.title: This Sound System is everything we hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Bose system! Can play CD''s if desired. We use it and play from the phone or IPad using iTunes or Amazon Prime music! The only con is the inability to play multiple CD's if desired! A little disappointed with this inconvenience, especially with Christmas Season, but we have been able to find most of our Classic Christmas records and Cd's on Itunes or Amazon so it is not a total loss as we can still hear that great music!
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.....
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchase a Bose Wave Bose Wave SoundTouch Music System IV. The sound was adequate but considering the highly inflated price, the system didn’t even come with an antenna. I live in the country and the reception stinks. I have a piece of junk kids CD/radio that I purchased for $49 (one tenth of the price of the Bose) that has substantially better reception. Of course, you can purchase an antenna for an additional cost. As far as I can discern, consumers are paying $100 for the radio and $400 for the Bose name....
customer_reviews.author: abigail galish

customer_reviews.title: Bose does it again.
customer_reviews.text: I have had Bose Wave radios for years and have always appreciated these high quality products. After the local classical radio station switched to "oldies," I had to find a replacement. With Sirius-XM in my car, it only took another $4 a month to be able to stream through my wi-fi. The new set arrived today and was a no-brainer to set up. It's really to manage with the XM iphone app. Sound quality is first-rate, and I also really love the Bose remote. True, it's pricey, but the high quality is worth paying for.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelS

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time ordering, I have one for our guest room and one for our room and I love the sound quality. I highly recommend spending the extra $$ for Bose over some of the other music systems out there.
customer_reviews.author: ABK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed... first of all, on volume 33 is when you start to hear a hint of noise from the radio, at max volume it isnt as loud or rich as I expected. There is no equalizer so you cant adjust bass or treble. Dont really care for the app that works with this either. The only way this works with all of the music apps they have listed is with your phone via bluetooth, so when you get a phone call, your music stops. For 600 bucks, I expect way more. Sending this back, not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting to know my Bose. Now i have Bought HomeSpot NFC-Enabled Bluetooth Audio Receiver for Sound System, so i can connect to my wired speakers. i didnt want to get rid of my speakers because my brother who has passed on gave them to me. The Bose is not as loud as i want it to be. So with the wired speakers hooked up to eth NFC receiver it makes it nice and loud as if im in a dance club. this is exactly what i needed. I can now connect my google phone and my ipad to the Bose via Bluethooth. works great. Now my next step is to connect my tv and im all hooked up.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Beal

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great, but it's time to upgrade the features
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fine, but it's time Bose made it possible for the user to connect wireless headphones via Bluetooth without having to add a third-party adapter. Also, SoundTouch should be able to control the cd player functions - you can see the Wave speaker - why not give the user the ability to make cds part of the whole house experience without forcing us to rip cds to a personal music library. Overall, this seems to be something of a half-baked product.
customer_reviews.author: Raffles

customer_reviews.title: Waited Years for this System
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to set up, but now I can play music from my computer, my phone, a CD, my TuneIn account--and it sounds just terrific. Previously I had a Cambridge Soundworks internet radio, which had almost as great sound, but they stopped supporting software upgrades and it became increasingly limited as a result. This system replaced it and in just one day I can say I have no regrets whatever. The SoundTouch software gives me so much more versatility and mastery over my music--definitely worth the money. I waited years for a Bose system--and it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Alan White

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment. This was defective right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Huge disappointment. This was defective right out of the box. The system constantly shuts off all on its own. Customer service and tech-support were pretty useless. Now I have to ship it to Bose to get it repaired. This also comes with the absolute worst remote I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Works well except that from time to time it drops ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well except that from time to time it drops its wi-fi link to the router for reasons unknown. The router is only 5 feet away and the drop out is n to a daily occurrence. I have a CD changer connected to it and would prefer standard RCA-type radio jacks rather than the mini phone plug, but this is not aa big drawback for me.
customer_reviews.author: RIBill

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: I Have a Bose Wave Music system for 11 years and love it. In December 2018 I up grated to Wave Sound Touch Music System 1V. I'm very disappointed with the Bluetooth part of the system, I bought the system In December but didn't try to connect to my Wi-Fi until 2 weeks ago, I have expend hours trying to connect but I haven't being able to, I try for days and so many hours but unable to do so. What a waste of money, the system works great but not the Bluetooth, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Isabel Negron

customer_reviews.title: A new addition to our Bose Wave collection
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Bose Wave system that we have bought in the past two decades and each one has been an improvement over its predecessor, though we never expected that as we have always been satisfied. The System IV offers a more mellow sound than the earlier models. It will still fill the room with plenty of volume left over. Too many new features to detail here but we are more than happy with the latest one. The others are still in use elsewhere in our home but my bride is hogging this one.
customer_reviews.author: G in SC

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious about the quality of the sound, as in my day, speakers had to be large and distanced form each other! But the digital quality of this is very good. My CDS sound great and I can get radio channels via the internet that I never had before, very clearly. On the whole, it's worth the price and I doubt I'll ever need anything better, plus it's easy to install use and takes up little space.
customer_reviews.author: M. johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bose Wave Soundtouch not for me
customer_reviews.text: We returned the radio to the seller with no problems and we were refunded the entire purchase in a timely manner. We could not get the radio to work via bluetooth. Other items in our house run on bluetooth but this radio would not. The sound was fantastic but if we could not connect to internet radio it was worthless for us.
customer_reviews.author: Judy in CA

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is good, but the Bose apps are garbage
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, but the Bose apps are garbage. They have been promising an Alexa skill for the last year but it still doesn't support it. They have amazon music, but you cannot search for songs with in. Every other time I try to use the app I need to download another update which has never added a feature I am looking for, but instead just means I get to wait for 10 minutes while everything updates. I expected much better for the amount I paid for this!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: The phone app will not readily connect to the speaker or remain connected
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this product again. The audio system is as good as any Bose system however the connectivity to the phone app is horrible. It makes using the device very very frustrating. There are many less expensive speaker systems that work MUCH better yet sound as good. I have given the company over a year to fix this problem. After many requests the problem remains unchanged.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Bose systems as long as I can remember, possibly 30 years? This was the first system I found to be mediocre. One of the reviews I read prior to purchasing stated this system was no better than a regular radio system that you'd pay $100 for. I should have listened because it's true. This unit cost me over $600 yet the performance, reception and versatility are NOT superior to any media device that I've come in contact with!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Dungy

customer_reviews.title: disappointing as an upgrade but sound is the same quality just not as loud
customer_reviews.text: we have had a bose wave for a long time ....before blue tooth. so we decided to upgrade. blue tooth keeps cutting out at about 50ft. I tried to download the bose app. after about the 20 time I gave up. just using the Bluetooth now. we can get our old Bose louder. kinda bummed at this upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: J Eis

customer_reviews.title: 1 star-- sent it in for repairs a few months ago but now it does not work
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this expensive CD player around June 2017. It worked OK for several months. But it stopped playing CDs and now (December 3, 2019) will not even eject or play a CD which it played well yesterday. This is expensive junk. We sent it in for repairs a few months ago but now it does not work. Avoid this music system.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Sumerford

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in sound quality
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely Love Bose products and have several Bose items. For the price of this Wave sound touch, we were very disappointed in the sound quality! And also didn't like that the top part of the Bose sound wave just sits on top part of the cd player. It doesn't snap together just connects by the cable in the back. We were so disappointed for the price we paid for it, that we sent it back! No hassle getting our money refunded! So we were happy about that!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal T.

customer_reviews.title: a real winner
customer_reviews.text: thank you for the extremely great service it arrived on my birthday only three days after i ordered it the sound was fantastic, and it looks great wherever i put it. you folks made what started out to be a real crappy day into one of pure joy. being able to play my music comes in a close second to my books and movies thank you my other got ruined and i figured i was dead in the water for a good three weeks or more you saved this day.
customer_reviews.author: D. Knox

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed by the quality of this product. When it works, the sound and App is nice, but the connection to the App getting lost all the time, having to set it up again and again. And the cherry on the top? 6 months after purchasing, i realized the CD player doesn't read any CD's. This is only the 2nd time i used a CD with this unit... Now I need to send the unit for repair and wait about 3 weeks (hopefully not longer) for repair!
customer_reviews.author: Yaron Netz

customer_reviews.title: it's all pretty good, and sounds incredible
customer_reviews.text: Omg. This thing is incredible. Bose knows what they're doing. The app is decent, but doesn't really control as much as it should. For instance, you can't switch to auxiliary input from the app, have to use the remote. Same with the bass control, which is misleading. It only has normal and low setting, you can't adjust between these settings. But still, it's all pretty good, and sounds incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J.

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound from a smallish Box
customer_reviews.text: What is it to dislike? This is an amazing piece of tech, the tuner works fine as long as there is no nearby interference, otherwise may require an amplification antenna. The remote works like a charm. The unit cannot be operated without a remote (which might be considered by some as a draw back), but it does not bother me much. The touch feature that turns it on or off is also nice... The CDs are played beautifully with the typical Bose depth and width of sound. Piece is wifi capable and could interact / communicate with smart applications. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zhiv

customer_reviews.title: Bose does it again!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my 1997 system in which the CD player died. I'll still keep the old system as a portable radio. I love Bose products. Currently, I have 3 systems. This new product plays my i-pod with an aux cable connection..costs about 4 dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Cecile L. Hand

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable product
customer_reviews.text: Installation of this product was nightmare-ish, exhausting, and difficult. With a lot of patience and perhaps a teenager, perhaps the process is smoother. I just didn't have a teenager tech available. I had difficulties with the software and order of operations. Tech support was excellent but not effective; but very professional. I gradually figured out a couple of work around(s)
customer_reviews.author: Robert Murdock

customer_reviews.title: I love my bose radio!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bose and use it everyday...being able to listen 1000's of internet station with limited commercials is wonderful. The sound quality is fabulous and music sound amazing. I don't use the CD very much but it's easy to use and handy when I need it. I love I can control it by my iPhone or remote. It was the best purchase I've made in the last few years and will buy more Bose products. They are a bit more expense but you can not beat the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Al Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! Meets all my needs
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this Bose stereo! It's great that I can be in the kitchen and control it from my iPad! The sound is great and it connects with Amazon Music and Sirius XM beautifully! I've gotten rid of my old stereo and speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Check it out
customer_reviews.text: This music system is the real deal. I just got this yesterday and already love it.. I was listening to a CD in minutes. It connected to my computer, smart phone, and amazon HD kindle in about 10 minutes. Wi-Fi and blue tooth both seem to work well and the sound is excellent. This is a decent sound system for such a compact system. No it's not nearly as good as separates but would say it definitely gets the job done if tight on space and just want compact system.
customer_reviews.author: smterrapin

customer_reviews.title: And after a week of this and talking with Bose four times without resolution the best they could offer was a repair after I had
customer_reviews.text: Extreme caution should be given before ordering this item. It has glitches that the company has no answer for. The internet radio feature is very very limited and the alarm system keyed to it dysfunctions continuously producing buzzer types instead of music. And after a week of this and talking with Bose four times without resolution the best they could offer was a repair after I had this only one week and it never ever worked correctly. After speaking to a manager they offered a lame well replace it but you must send it to us first. Don't darken my door again! Thank goodness for Amazon's return policy because folks this system is a LEMON! Bye Bye and good riddance!
customer_reviews.author: Granny Chris

customer_reviews.title: Like it BUT
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sytem, however the lighting is very dim, the clock cannot be read unless you are right in front of it and there is no way to make it brighter. It also will help to have some type of antena. The sound is okay if you turn the volumn up very high. All in all it is good for my bedroom listening pleasure. I have always wanted a Bose System for my home, because I enjoyed the systems I have had in my cars, but, this home system cannot be compared to the auto systems.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: The Bose Wave sounds fantastic. The shipping the very slow
customer_reviews.text: The Bose Wave sounds fantastic. The shipping the very slow; took over 2 weeks to arrive and I took pictures of the box as it was destroyed although the radio itself was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: A 21st Century HAL for Sound
customer_reviews.text: Though expensive, this is one of the best radios on the market. It does conventional radio. It also does internet radio. The clarity is unbelievable! It also links via Bluetooth to any Bluetooth enabled device. I've used it with my iPod Touch 5s and my Lumia 1520. Again, the sound quality is unbelievable. To be honest, I've never tried the CD player. If you want a device that gives you maximum flexibility with quality sound, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Fills the room with concert hall sound. The networking capability to access services such as Amazon music is really nice. Radio has superior receiver strength on stations even without the FM antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system. Fills my whole house with clear sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome system. Fills my whole house with clear sound no matter the volume. Plenty loud. You get what you pay for and Bose nailed this! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: DClos

customer_reviews.title: Great sound ready for a Smart Home!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We replaced our previous version of the same product after 15+ years of virtually continual use. I think we got our money’s worth! I love the upgrades! It has an app that works well. Setup took a few minutes but was not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, and I like the CD player because
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this unit. Great sound, and I like the CD player because, like some of us, I still have my CD's The internet radio is a great feature that I use regularly. Can't go wrong with this system
customer_reviews.author: Zen

customer_reviews.title: The is a great sounding entertainment system
customer_reviews.text: The is a great sounding entertainment system! you can link up to other speakers with an adaptor. My whole house has great sound without all the wires. I bought it for my wife who is afraid of technology, but she uses it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Pluribus01

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a home run purchase. I’m a musician and the sound is awesome! I have it in our living room, but take it out on our screened porch while cooking out on the grill. It’s so nice having the music outside and being able to stream from amazon prime music is so convenient. I also enjoy playing my own music on cds that I record. Just remember to take it back inside!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money A little echo is just as good for 1/5 the price
customer_reviews.author: Dara Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality once you go in and adjust the booming bass out. Reception is decent, and I did not notice it much better with the exeternal FM antenna plugged in. One thing I did not like about it, is that you cannot control it without the remote. If you lose the remote, you’re screwed. The remote does not have a very far distance that it works. The clock loses time pretty regularly, I have to add a few minutes every week to it. The readout on the display is often times to damn and I cannot read it.
customer_reviews.author: spock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.  Just awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bose! Sounds Amazing. Easy set up. And yes, love the CD player. Typically have poor radio reception but this Bose found stations we didn't know know were available. Easily set up to Amazon music, using tablet, and listening within minutes. So glad we waited for wifi capabilities. Absolutely love this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Better Sound Available From a Music-Radio
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and we both love it. The ability to play internet music and control from a tablet or phone is a definite plus. I just wish they had more content, and that it would keep the last setting when controlling this and the other SoundTouch speakers, i.e. both playing the same music. Every time you turn it on, it defaults to each speaker being separate until you combine them with a tablet or phone. Hopefully they will include that in an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Schleis

customer_reviews.title: ... our Bose Wave Radio purchased nearly 16 years ago--- love the added Bluetooth connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit to replace our Bose Wave Radio purchased nearly 16 years ago--- love the added Bluetooth connectivity, iPhone/iPad App and WiFi streaming from various sources. Excellent sound quality, nice and small functional remote and an visually attractive unit.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinafishingboy

customer_reviews.title: Life is complete music heard the way it was meant to sound
customer_reviews.text: The most incredible sound imaginable in a unit this size, or any size. I actually got tears of happiness, just listening to the demonstration cd provided with the sound system. I love music, played several different instruments throughout my life and I am in love with my new Bose. Somehow my life feels complete at the sweet age of 62.
customer_reviews.author: lopawa

customer_reviews.title: Stands up proudly to Bose name
customer_reviews.text: It won't work with the speakers designed for bluetooth but to be fair it could be the speakers are damaged (I've gotten no"realhelp" from the seller and cannot return them) the unit itself stands vibrantly carrying the bose name. I love the purchase crispness clarity and quality. All present
customer_reviews.author: Astrid Richey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bose Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Wave radio I have purchased since the original one form the 1990’s. It’s definitely a worthy successor to the original, great sound quality, easy to set up Bluetooth and the Bose App. It’s expensive, but well worth it for the sound and construction quality.
customer_reviews.author: FozCat

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and clear sounding but the volume doesn't max out ...
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back. For the price it's not all what it's cracked up to be. It is nice and clear sounding but the volume doesn't max out very loud, and you can't adjust the bass, rather are stuck with the preset and that's for the birds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful, clear full sound
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to all the promises...wonderful, clear full sound, fills the dining room, as well as the kitchen and living room, and is heard well throughout the rest of the single floor two bedroom and den house! The remote works well and is easy to use, and the volume range is huge. We love it! The sound quality is top notch, and the adjustments are easy to set. Les
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Great little system!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. It exceeded both our expectations. the sound is really dynamic and room filling. We listen to the radio now every day.
customer_reviews.author: The Masked Chicken

customer_reviews.title: User friendly & Wonderful sound
customer_reviews.text: Unblievable sound for such a small unit and the remote is user friendly. I find the bluetooth capability particularly nice with it connecting to my phone or pad and providing music or news through inumerable sources. It also plays cd's well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Warren

customer_reviews.title: ... a sixteen-year-old Bose radio w/ CD that still works great, but we decided to upgrade
customer_reviews.text: We have a sixteen-year-old Bose radio w/ CD that still works great, but we decided to upgrade. It was very easy to learn to use. I love the on/off touch top. We were already in the habit of keeping the remote by our older Bose, so that has not been a problem. My teenage daughter came in the room the first day and without any instructions and within just a minute used her android phone to starting listening to Spotify through the new Bose. My husband also uses his Kindle to listen to his Sirius radio programs through the new Bose. We are very pleased and love the new listening possibilities it has opened for this technology age.
customer_reviews.author: ldalsp

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my back porch. Setup Was easy for WiFi and Bluetooth. Took about 10 minutes. SoundTouch Tune in app is a nice added bonus
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this SoundTouch music system. Easy to setup. Joined the WiFi at my house. Paired it with other devices. ♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Marek

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this Sound System!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent stereo/radio/cd player/wi-fi music streaming system. My family uses it daily and we are very pleased with it, especially my spouse who is an avid audiophile. I purchased the Bose Wave SoundTouch Music System IV several months ago and it still operates as if we got it yesterday. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowfax

customer_reviews.title: Great System!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound system; highly recommended. The only caveat is that the app that controls it is somewhat challenging to configure. Once configured, however, it works quite well and the speaker can be controlled from a phone, tablet or laptop. I am very pleased with the Bose Wave and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound old WiFi tech.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great but lacks any deeper bass. The WiFi connection is only 802.11n. Which is legacy technology being we have now moved up to 802.11 AC years ago and WiFi 6 is out as of earlier last year. Integration with Alexa was easy.
customer_reviews.author: EMERY E DECAVITCH

customer_reviews.title: works  but
customer_reviews.text: great service help i have had no problems so far everything works well . had product about a month update have had this about 0ne year 6 months service for problem I had not resolved . does not auto reject and got it back with more problems. and that one still not corrected. they tell me now I am over the warrant and theirs nothing they can do. even though they did not fix it when it was.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Glad we purchased this
customer_reviews.text: We dithered a long time about buying a Bose and hit the perfect time. We love the sound quality from the SoundTouch and that we can control it from our smart phones. We also have a Sirius XM subscription and can run that through this stereo.
customer_reviews.author: omnivorous Reader 42

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these units. These things are great with incredible sound. Ordered 2 external FM antennas suggested, but the power cord serves as the antenna so I'll be doing a return on the external antennas.
customer_reviews.author: KAA / JKC

customer_reviews.title: USB FEATURE LACKING
customer_reviews.text: Given the price tag for this item this radio lack one key feature which is the lack of the USB port does not support charging and music playback. Also would be nice to have HD radio built in for such a premium radio. Sound quality very good! Ease of use also good. Just disappointed that the USB port not supported for charging and music playback.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C Takata

customer_reviews.title: I Love the Bose Wave
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Bose Wave for 30+ years and this was an update with a built-in CD player. A fine upgrade to a great design. I just wish the price was lower. If so, I would probably purchase a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Furuta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound!
customer_reviews.text: It's Bose, need I say more??? You get what you pay for, this system cost more but you get what you pay for. Awesome sound! One big fail though- put a cd in and you get zip for info. It's is connect to the internet but cant tell you the name of the artist or the track that's playing. Come on, REALLY?
customer_reviews.author: Joey T.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bose Sound System Ever
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality makes me feel like I'm sitting in Orchestra Hall. Easy to install, great remote control & attractive, streamlined design. Impressive features like Bluetooth, Alexa and alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is almost exactly what I wanted. However, not having the controls ON the unit, being dependent on the remote, is not what I would want ideally. Overall, I am a dedicated Bose audiophile. I have had my last Bose radio alarm clock for over 20 years, and it's still going strong! Jennifer
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Again providing us with an amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: As usual this company puts out a great product. If I were to say anything negative it would be the fact that I prefer to have the buttons on the top of the machine as a choice or option and the remote like I did with the previous radio from this company. That is my one and only complaint... And it’s not really a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Bose system, and I could not be happier. The sound is rich and crystal clear. And, just as advertised, it really does sound as if you're at a concert. My only complaint would be with the wave sound app. It is difficult and awkward to use, and it will not recognize my existing accounts with Pandora and iheart radio. But that aside, I highly recommend the Bose wave sound touch music IV.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, very happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best radio I've ever had in my long life, so far. The sound is crystal clear, with base tones that I've never heard before. I'm so happy with this purchase, and the fact that it connects to Pandora and other venues makes it a win/win. I have a lot of beautiful music in CD's that I thought I was going to have to get rid of, and it even plays these flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Simply Bose Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bose is an amazing brand and its products are amazing. This radio definitely fills a room with sound. Unfortunately you may not extend sound from this Radio to external Bluetooth speakers unless its the SoundTouch Series. Bose should make it so it can output sound to any Bluetooth external speaker.
customer_reviews.author: MauSauma

customer_reviews.title: Bad app no tone base adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the $500 plus. App sucks sent it back Can’t adjust tone or base. Have it their way or not at all Cd got stuck mfg wait to hit the cd unit real hard. It worked lol really
customer_reviews.author: Gordon F

product_meta.title: Bose Wave SoundTouch Music System IV, works with Alexa, Platinum Silver - 738031-1310
product_meta.description:
Color:Platinum SilverThere’s a world of music out there. The Bose Wave SoundTouch music system lets you easily enjoy all of it. Use it to stream millions of songs from music services like Spotify and Pandora, thousands of Internet radio stations and your stored music library. There’s also a CD player and AM/FM radio tuner. So you can hear whatever you want with room-filling sound—all from an easy-to-use system that now comes in a fresh design. The Wave SoundTouch system is part of an entire family of Bose wireless products for every room of your home that lets you play your favorite music at the touch of a single button. They connect to your home Wi-Fi network, so there’s no complicated equipment to add. A free, powerful app lets you explore online music from around the world. Plus, it transforms your phone into a powerful remote so you can control your music, no matter where you are.

Enjoy hands-free voice access to your music on SoundTouch speakers using any Alexa-enabled device—like the Amazon Echo Dot. Just open the Alexa app. Search for “Bose” under the Skills menu. Then follow the simple one-time setup.
Common commands: 
Alexa, play Niall Horan in the Living Room. 
Alexa, turn up the volume in the Kitchen. 
Alexa, pause the Office. 
Alexa, next track in the Bedroom.Power supply: 240V 50/60Hz 60W max
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately), Power Cord 8 feet
Enjoy all your music easily: online music services, Internet radio, your stored music library, CDs and AM/FM radio
Exclusive Bose waveguide speaker technology delivers lifelike, room filling sound
Wireless connection via your home Wi Fi network; also works with Bluetooth. Supported audio formats: MP3, WMA, AAC, FLAC, Apple Lossless. Wireless network compatibility 802.11 b/g/n
One touch access to music services (Amazon Music, Spotify, Pandora), Internet radio and music library playlists with six personalized presets on the remote or SoundTouch app
Ask away. With the new Bose Skill for Alexa you can now enjoy hands free voice control of your SoundTouch speakers using any Alexa enabled device – like the Echo Dot
Waveguide speaker technology delivers deep, high performance sound

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,346 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
